channel.title: Need help with 7 things!
channel.description:
hey,
I need some help with :
1.) using a source that works on the silab client but, it stand full with nulls the items, like all armor,items. How i get them out it so i can wear it and se it in the silab client.(tell me how what where i have to do,put it)
2.)Fully coded training area,and a shop place at varrock castle and what folder i need to past it in.
3.) How i change the ::home zone
4.) How to make a staff zone
5.) how to add npc you can fight with and how to add npc that dont move and say a text
6.)How to make a powerfull weapon like the silverlight (or what ever the name is) sword that can kill players in 1 hit and how to make unlimited hp ring. explain me how but it would be easier for me if u just give me code plz and where i have to paste.
7.) how to add teleport tabs where normaly the emotes are (normaly ther stand 'yes' emote and 'no','angry','dance') give me or tell me how if u give me code tell me where to put! -----------------------------TELL ME ALLWAY"s IN WHAT FOLDER I HAVE TO PASTE WHAT-------------------------
HELP realy needed ---thankss!

item.title: Need help with 7 things!
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

ok are you using a 317?

these are many basic questions please look in the tutorials section. because posting here is a waste of time for people with real questions.

Read full topic
